nm: Yo Ho Ho & a Bottle o' Beats
How Smooth Yer Plank Walkin' Be

nml: Because Mashing Keys Randomly Ain‚Äôt Strategy ‚å®Ô∏è

nm: Move it, ye sea slug! Hit them ‚ÄòScurry Left‚Äô and ‚ÄòScurry Right‚Äô buttons to shuffle yer boots. If ye be losin‚Äô track o‚Äô yerself, jump or walk ‚Äî the ruckus‚Äôll show where ye be. Then get through that blasted door on the right, afore I toss ye overboard!
en: To move, press the "Move Left" and "Move Right" buttons. You can be seen if you make sounds - for example, walking or jumping. Go through the door on the right.

nm: To leap like a lively dolphin, smash that Jump button! If ye wanna see what lies in the fog ahead, point yer cursed mouse and blast the Sonar button ‚Äî it‚Äôll light up the shadows like a lantern in a storm!
en: You can jump by pressing the jump button. To see through the space in front of you - point your mouse and press the sonar button.

nm: Some blasted doors ain‚Äôt worth their rust ‚Äòtil ye smack a glowin‚Äô button ‚Äî it‚Äôll pulse like a drunk sea rat‚Äôs heartbeat and whisper like a ghost with secrets. Once ye trigger it, ye best haul yer barnacled backside to that door ‚Äî quick! Dilly-dally, and ye‚Äôll be pressin‚Äô the bloody thing all over again, ya slow-footed bilge rat!
en: To open some doors, you need to activate a button - it pulses and makes a quiet sound. After activating the button(s), you will have time to get to the door. If you do not have time, you need to activate the button again

nm: Some cursed rooms be hidin‚Äô platforms like sneaky sea spirits ‚Äî ye won‚Äôt see ‚Äòem ‚Äòtil ye blast ‚Äòem with yer sonar. Aim that scallywag of a mouse where ye think they‚Äôre lurkin‚Äô, and fire off the sonar button. Hit the right spot, and the ghostly planks‚Äôll show themselves ‚Äî else ye be fallin‚Äô faster than a cannonball in a storm!
en: Some rooms have "invisible" platforms. To reveal them, you must hit them with sonar. To do this, aim at the location where the sonar is used and press the sonar button.
